title: Designing Inquiry-Based Language Learning Environments: Customized Projects for Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language analysis skills and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Designing an environment where professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields acquire advanced language analysis skills applicable to real-world tasks through inquiry-based projects

learning_goals: Learners can independently design inquiry projects analyzing language patterns based on real-world work cases
Learners can systematically investigate the structure and context of language data using digital tools (online labs, learning apps)
Learners can produce expert-level language analysis reports based on project outcomes and conduct peer evaluations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
